title: If the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't take effect in new PDF emitter.
OB: When using the new PDF emitter, if the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item does not disappear in the generated PDF.
EB: In the PDF preview, the item with the display property set to 'none' should be hidden or not visible.
SR:
1. Open the application that uses the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Observe that the item with the display property set to 'none' is still visible in the PDF.
